```diff
+             { id: 'dialogue-user-4', type: 'dialogue', speaker: '王女士', text: dialogues['user-5'], parent: 'stage3' }, // 注意这里是user-5，不是user-4
+             { id: 'dialogue-manual-2', type: 'dialogue', speaker: '小李', text: dialogues['manual-2'], parent: 'stage3' },
+             { id: 'dialogue-user-5', type: 'dialogue', speaker: '王女士', text: dialogues['user-6'], parent: 'stage3' }, // 注意这里是user-6，不是user-5
+             { id: 'system-update-1', type: 'system-update', text: dialogues['system-update-1'], parent: 'stage3' },
+             { id: 'dialogue-manual-3', type: 'dialogue', speaker: '小李', text: dialogues['manual-3'], parent: 'stage3' },
+             { id: 'dialogue-user-6', type: 'dialogue', speaker: '王女士', text: dialogues['user-7'], parent: 'stage3' }, // 注意这里是user-7，不是user-6
+             { id: 'ai-knowledge-match', display: 'block', action: () => { document.getElementById('ai-knowledge-match').style.display = 'block'; }, parent: 'stage3' },
+             { id: 'knowledge-content', type: 'code', text: dialogues['knowledge-content'], parent: 'ai-knowledge-match' },
+             { id: 'dialogue-manual-4', type: 'dialogue', speaker: '小李', text: dialogues['manual-4'], parent: 'stage3' },
+             { id: 'dialogue-user-7', type: 'dialogue', speaker: '王女士', text: dialogues['user-8'], parent: 'stage3' }, // 注意这里是user-8，不是user-7
+             { id: 'dialogue-manual-5', type: 'dialogue', speaker: '小李', text: dialogues['manual-5'], parent: 'stage3' },
+             { id: 'full-ticket', display: 'block', action: () => { document.getElementById('full-ticket').style.display = 'block'; }, parent: 'stage4' },
+             { id: 'ticket-content', type: 'code', text: dialogues['ticket-content'], parent: 'full-ticket' },
+             { id: 'collaboration-comparison', display: 'block', action: () => { document.getElementById('collaboration-comparison').style.display = 'block'; }, parent: 'stage5' },
+             { id: 'ai-contribution', type: 'code', text: dialogues['ai-contribution'], parent: 'collaboration-comparison' },
+             { id: 'manual-value', type: 'code', text: dialogues['manual-value'], parent: 'collaboration-comparison' },
+             { id: 'overall-effect', type: 'code', text: dialogues['overall-effect'], parent: 'collaboration-comparison' },
+             { id: 'collaboration-highlights', display: 'block', action: () => { document.getElementById('collaboration-highlights').style.display = 'block'; }, parent: 'stage5' },
+             { id: 'highlights-content', type: 'code', text: dialogues['highlights-content'], parent: 'collaboration-highlights' },
+             { id: 'conclusion', display: 'block', action: () => { document.getElementById('conclusion').style.display = 'block'; document.getElementById('conclusion').innerText = dialogues['conclusion']; }, parent: 'stage5' }
+         ];
+ 
+ 
+         function showSection(sectionId) {
+             const section = document.getElementById(sectionId);
+             if (section) {
+                 section.classList.add('show');
+             }
+         }
+ 
+         function typeWriterEffect(element, text, delay = 20) {
+             let i = 0;
+             element.innerHTML = ''; // Clear content first
+             return new Promise(resolve => {
+                 function type() {
+                     if (i < text.length) {
+                         if (text.substring(i, i + 4) === '<br>') { // Check for <br> tag
+                             element.innerHTML += '<br>';
+                             i += 4;
+                         } else {
+                             element.innerHTML += text.charAt(i);
+                             i++;
+                         }
+                         setTimeout(type, delay);
+                     } else {
+                         resolve();
+                     }
+                 }
+                 type();
+             });
+         }
+ 
+ 
+         async function runNextStep() {
+             if (currentStep < steps.length) {
+                 const step = steps[currentStep];
+                 const element = document.getElementById(step.id);
+ 
+                 // Show the parent section if it's not already visible
+                 if (step.parent) {
+                     showSection(step.parent);
+                 }
+ 
+                 if (step.action) {
+                     await step.action();
+                 } else if (element) {
+                     if (step.type === 'dialogue') {
+                         element.classList.add(step.speaker === 'AI机器人' ? 'ai' : (step.speaker === '王女士' ? 'user' : ''));
+                         await typeWriterEffect(element, `<strong>${step.speaker}:</strong> ${step.text}`);
+                     } else if (step.type === 'system-update') {
+                         element.classList.add('system-update');
+                         await typeWriterEffect(element, step.text);
+                     } else if (step.type === 'code') {
+                         await typeWriterEffect(element, step.text);
+                     }
+                     element.style.display = 'block'; // Ensure it's visible after typing
+                 }
+                 currentStep++;
+             } else {
+                 nextBtn.disabled = true;
+                 nextBtn.innerText = "演示结束";
+             }
+         }
+ 
+         nextBtn.addEventListener('click', runNextStep);
+ 
+         // Initially hide all sections except the intro
+         sections.forEach((section, index) => {
+             if (section.id !== 'intro') {
+                 section.style.opacity = '0';
+                 section.style.transform = 'translateY(20px)';
+             }
+         });
+         document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
+             showSection('intro');
+         });
+ 
+     </script>
+ </body>
+ </html>
+ 
```

---



---

`demo.html` 文件已经创建并包含了所有的HTML结构、CSS样式以及用于动态演示的JavaScript代码。

**如何运行演示：**

1.  **打开文件：** 在您的文件浏览器中找到 `llm_12345/demo.html` 文件，并用您喜欢的网页浏览器（如Chrome, Firefox等）打开它。
2.  **开始演示：** 页面加载后，您会看到一个“开始演示”按钮。点击此按钮，演示将逐步展开，每次点击都会展示下一阶段的对话或系统信息。

这个页面将模拟AI客服与用户对话、转接人工、人工处理、工单生成以及最终的人机协作效果分析的整个流程。

如果您在运行过程中遇到任何问题，或者对页面内容有其他需求，请随时告诉我！

---
